name: SPACE FIGHT (Alsharefee)
description:
A job challenge and I decided to put more work on it and publish it here on Itch.

Controls:

1. Mouse for shooting and mouse wheel for zooming.

2. W,D,A and S for movement.

This is only a prototype, hope you like it.

If you you are interested in playing a full game of it  then please let me know in the comments.
